str2: Feminine of a derivative of soter as noun; rescue or safety.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
No one, none, nothing.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
(a) of two: another, a second, (b) other, different, (c) one's neighbor. Of uncertain affinity; other or different.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
Perhaps from the same as oros; the sky; by extension, heaven; by implication, happiness, power, eternity; specially, the Gospel.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Third person singular active present of deo; also deon deh-on'; neuter active participle of the same; both used impersonally; it is Necessary.
To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
